item.title: Liquor store POS
item.dc:creator: Alix Fraser
item.author: Alix Fraser
item.custom_modules_master_0_description: From setting age limits at the register to fulfilling niche requests, Lightspeed has what your liquor store needs to handle every step of the sales journey. With our iPad POS system, inventory information and customer profiles are at your fingertips, allowing you to sell in more connected, personalized ways.
item.custom_modules_master_1_description: Liquor stores sell by the case and by the bottle. You sell varying flavors and volumes. As a liquor store, you need a POS system that can handle your inventory needs while saving you time on purchasing—and Lightspeed can get you there.

item.author: Étienne Leprette
item.custom_modules_master_0_description: Ensure the safety and security of your data with full encryption and complete PCI compliance. Have peace of mind knowing that your data is always safe and never compromised.

item.title: Golf – Resort
item.dc:creator: Étienne Leprette
item.author: Étienne Leprette
item.custom_modules_master_0_description: Cut down on busywork and ensure you're giving your guests the personal service they deserve. With automation, your tedious tasks will be taken care of so you have more time for tasks that truly add value.

item.title: Golf – Multi Course
item.dc:creator: Étienne Leprette
item.author: Étienne Leprette
item.custom_modules_master_0_description: Look into your operations from every angle and see high level reports or dive deep with granular reports. With hundreds of reports to choose from, you'll gain a new perspective on your business.

item.title: Golf – Private
item.dc:creator: Étienne Leprette
item.author: Étienne Leprette
item.custom_modules_master_0_description: Tedious tasks take away valuable time from you every day. Let automation do some of the work for you so that you can focus on value-adding tasks and interact with your members on a personal level.

item.author: Étienne Leprette

item.title: CBD POS draft
item.dc:creator: Alix Fraser
item.author: Alix Fraser
item.custom_modules_master_0_description: Your products are in high demand, and with Lightspeed's POS system for CBD shops, you can keep making sales even if your bestselling products are on backorder. Cater to niche needs with special orders and collect personal information in customer profiles to ensure consistent, top-notch service every single time.
item.custom_modules_master_1_description: Expand with eCommerce software designed to grow your business and sync to your inventory and locations from your brick-and-mortar CBD shops.

item.title: Vape Store POS
item.dc:creator: Alix Fraser
item.author: Alix Fraser
item.custom_modules_master_0_description: With Lightspeed, you have the freedom to personalize your service as needed while remaining compliant with local and federal regulations. Your staff has access to everything they need to tailor their service to each customer at their fingertips thanks to our cloud-based vape iPad POS system.
item.custom_modules_master_1_description: Expand with eCommerce software designed to grow your vape business and sync to your inventory and locations from your brick-and-mortar stores.

item.title: Full service POS
item.dc:creator: Alix Fraser
item.author: Alix Fraser
item.custom_modules_master_0_description: Empower your staff with an intuitive system, reduce wait times for diners and streamline ordering with a full service point of sale that makes any task faster and easier to do.
item.custom_modules_master_1_description: Take your menu on the road and sync to major food delivery apps with an integration made to grow your business.

item.title: Hotel restaurant POS
item.dc:creator: Alix Fraser
item.author: Alix Fraser
item.custom_modules_master_0_description: Customize your hotel restaurant's POS system to make your guests feel right at home. Plug your POS into your PMS and save valuable time with tools and integrations built to simplify your complex business.
item.custom_modules_master_1_description: Monitor your entire business with a POS that works for you. Opening a new location? Quickly add it in your POS and start selling instantly.

item.title: Bar POS
item.dc:creator: Alix Fraser
item.author: Alix Fraser
item.custom_modules_master_0_description: With just a couple taps, bartenders can quickly browse through menus, enter orders, open tabs and accept payments. Our cloud-based POS software helps you focus on what matters—creating unique experiences for customers.
item.custom_modules_master_1_description: Everything is automatic. Just process your payments, your POS will take care of everything else.

item.title: QSR POS
item.dc:creator: Alix Fraser
item.author: Alix Fraser
item.custom_modules_master_0_description: Say goodbye to long wait times. With Lightspeed Restaurant, your staff can view and fill orders from a single screen. And with a fully integrated delivery system, customers can order from anywhere, helping you increase your revenue.
item.custom_modules_master_1_description: Take your quick service menu on the road and sync to major food delivery apps with an integration made to grow your business.

item.title: Bike Shop POS 2

item.author: Tess Bemporat
item.custom_modules_master_0_description: Designed by bikers, with features specifically tailored to the omnichannel needs of independent bike shops, it's not hard to see why.
item.custom_modules_master_1_description: Lightspeed Supplier Market is a fully integrated way to purchase stock from the same place you manage and sell your inventory. With automated order processes and simplified product discovery workflows, you can run your business more efficiently than ever.

item.title: Golf course POS
item.dc:creator: Étienne Leprette
item.author: Étienne Leprette
item.custom_modules_master_1_description:
Run your business like a pro with Chronogolf by Lightspeed, the most powerful cloud-based tee sheet and golf course management software on the market.
Simplify your scheduling with a flexible, efficient, and user-friendly tee sheet
Create unlimited categories, book, and reorganize tee times instantly
Manage standards, shotguns, crossovers and front/backs in a few clicks
Access your tee sheet and customer data anytime, anywhere

item.title: Campus POS System
item.dc:creator: Ellie Lord
item.author: Ellie Lord
item.custom_modules_master_1_description: Do you waste time tracking down items in your current point of sale? Our system makes searching for items fast and simple. Place your products into customizable categories or tag them by product type so you can later retrieve them with a simple keyword search.
